Pre-Game Insights: India will look to punch their ticket in the Super Eight when they come up against high-flying USA in match 25 of the 2024 ICC T20 World Cup.
The Men In Blue came into the T20 World Cup looking to end their unlucky pattern of near misses in ICC events.
Team India made a positive start to the campaign with two wins in as many games so far as they sit at the top of Group A.
USA, first-time participants, sit second in the standings with four points after creating history at the Grand Prairie Stadium by beating Pakistan to secure their second win of the tournament.
Others: The highly-anticipated contest between India and USA will be held on Wednesday, June 12, 2024.
The game takes place at Nassau International Cricket Stadium on Long Island, New York.
Cricket fans in the US and Canada can watch every ball of the 2024 T20 World Cup live on WillowTV.
You can also stream the tournament live on Sling TV, which offers new subscribers $20 off their first month.
